class.name: Emogrifier
class.description: This class provides functions for converting CSS styles into inline style attributes in your HTML code.

class.name: EcommerceTaskFixBrokenOrderSubmissionData
class.description: After a bug in the saving of orders in the CMS This "fixer" was introduced to fix older orders without a submission record.

class.name: EcommerceTaskAPIandMore
class.description: This class reviews all of the static configurations in e-commerce for review (a) which configs are set, but not required (b) which configs are required, but not set (c) review of set configs

class.name: EcommerceTaskArchiveAllOrdersWithItems
class.description: After a bug in the saving of orders in the CMS This "fixer" was introduced to fix older orders without a submission record.

class.name: EcommerceTaskProductVariationsFixes
class.description: see description in class

class.name: EcommerceTaskCartManipulation_Current
class.description: shows you the link to remove the current cart

class.name: EcommerceTaskCartManipulation_Debug
class.description: shows you the link to remove the current cart

class.name: EcommerceTaskExportAllOrderItems
class.description: set the order id number.

class.name: EcommerceTaskOrderItemsPerCustomer
class.description: set the order id number.

class.name: EcommerceTaskDefaultRecords
class.description: create default records for e-commerce This does not include any products.

class.name: EcommerceTaskCreateMemberGroups
class.description: create the e-commerce specific Member Groups

class.name: EcommerceTaskProductImageReset
class.description: see description in class

class.name: EcommerceTaskCountryAndRegion
class.description: create standard country and regions

class.name: EcommerceTaskCountryAndRegion_DisallowAllCountries
class.description: update EcommerceCountry.DoNotAllowSales to 1 so that you can not sell to any country

class.name: EcommerceTaskCountryAndRegion_AllowAllCountries
class.description: update EcommerceCountry.DoNotAllowSales to 0 so that you can sell to all countries

class.name: EcommerceTaskArchiveAllSubmittedOrders
class.description: After a bug in the saving of orders in the CMS This "fixer" was introduced to fix older orders without a submission record.

class.name: EcommerceTaskLinkOrderAddressesAtBothEnds
class.description: works out how many products have been sold, per product.

class.name: EcommerceTaskTemplateTest
class.description: Get examples for building templates.

class.name: EcommerceTaskCheckConfiguration
class.description: This class reviews all of the static configurations in e-commerce for review (a) which configs are set, but not required (b) which configs are required, but not set (c) review of set configs

class.name: EcommerceTaskSetOrderIDStartingNumber
class.description: set the order id number.

class.name: EcommerceTaskLinkProductWithImages
class.description: Add any Image (or other file) to a product using the InternalItemID

class.name: EcommerceTaskAddCustomersToCustomerGroups
class.description: Adds all members, who have bought something, to the customer group.

class.name: EcommerceConfigAjaxDefinitions
class.description: This class defines all the names for IDs and Classes that are used within the e-commerce ajax framework.

class.name: EcommerceConfigAjax
class.description: This class returns the Ajax Definitions class.

class.name: EcommerceConfig
class.description: This Class creates an array of configurations for e-commerce.

class.name: EcommerceConfigDefinitions
class.description: This class sets out the static config variables for e-commerce.

class.name: EcommerceSideReport_EcommercePages
class.description: Ecommerce Pages except Products

class.name: EcommerceSideReport_FeaturedProducts
class.description: @authors: Nicolaas [at] Sunny Side Up .co.nz

class.name: EcommerceSideReport_AllProducts
class.description: Selects all products

class.name: EcommerceSideReport_NoImageProducts
class.description: Selects all products without an image.

class.name: EcommerceSideReport_NoInternalIDProducts
class.description: Selects all products without an InternalID

class.name: EcommerceSideReport_NoPriceProducts
class.description: Selects all products without a price.

class.name: EcommerceSideReport_NotForSale
class.description: Selects all products that are not for sale.

class.name: EcommerceSideReport_ProductsWithVariations
class.description: Products without variations

class.name: OrderModifierForm_Controller
class.description: This controller allows you to submit modifier forms from anywhere on the site, Most likely this will be from the the cart / checkout page.

class.name: OrderStatusLogForm_Controller
class.description: This controller allows you to submit Log forms from anywhere on the site, especially the cart / checkout page.

class.name: EcommercePaymentSupportedMethodsProvider
class.description: if you want to implement rules around selecting specific payment gateways for specific orders then you need to extend this class and add the following to mysite/_config/config.yml: Injector: EcommercePaymentSupportedMethodsProvider: class: MyCustom_EcommercePaymentSupportedMethodsProvider

class.name: EcommerceDBConfig
class.description: Database Settings for E-commerce Similar to SiteConfig but then for E-commerce To access a singleton here, use: EcommerceDBConfig::current_ecommerce_db_config()

class.name: EcommercePayment_Test
class.description: Payment object representing a generic test payment

class.name: EcommercePayment_TestFailure
class.description: Payment object representing a TEST = FAILURE

class.name: EcommercePayment
class.description: "Abstract" class for a number of different payment types allowing a user to pay for something on a site.

class.name: EcommercePayment_TestPending
class.description: Payment object representing a TEST = PENDING

class.name: EcommerceCurrency
class.description: Object to manage currencies

class.name: EcommercePayment_TestSuccess
class.description: Payment object representing a TEST = SUCCESS

class.name: OrderAttribute_Group
class.description: Allows you to group OrderAttributes

class.name: OrderStep_Created
class.description: This is the first Order Step.

class.name: OrderStatusLog_Submitted
class.description: OrderStatusLog_Submitted is an important class that is created when an order is submitted.

class.name: OrderModifier
class.description: which returns an array of IDs SEQUENCE - USE FOR ALL MODIFIERS!!! *** 1. model defining static variables (e.g. $db, $has_one) *** 2. cms variables + functions (e.g. getCMSFields, $searchableFields) *** 3. other (non) static variables (e.g. private static $special_name_for_something, protected $order) *** 4. CRUD functions (e.g. canEdit) *** 5. init and update functions *** 6. form functions (e. g. Showform and getform) *** 7. template functions (e.g. ShowInTable, TableTitle, etc...) ... USES DB VALUES *** 8. inner calculations.... USES CALCULATED VALUES *** 9. calculate database fields: protected function Live[field name] ... USES CALCULATED VALUES *** 10. standard database related functions (e.g. onBeforeWrite, onAfterWrite, etc...) *** 11. AJAX related functions *** 12. debug functions

class.name: EcommerceDevelopmentAdminDecorator
class.description: EcommerceDevelopmentAdminDecorator adds extra functionality to the DevelopmentAdmin It creates a developer view (as in www.mysite.com/dev/) specifically for ecommerce.

class.name: EcommerceDatabaseAdmin
class.description: One stop shop for massaging e-commerce related data AND running tests.

interface.name: EditableEcommerceObject
interface.description: describes any dataobject (apart from pages) that is editable in the CMS

interface.name: BuyableModel
interface.description: describes the buyable classes CONTENT: //GROUPS AND SIBLINGS //IMAGES //VERSIONING //ORDER ITEM //LINKS //TEMPLATE STUFF //CRUD SETTINGS

class.name: EcommerceCountry_VisitorCountryProvider
class.description: this is a very basic class with as its sole purpose providing the country of the customer.

class.name: ShoppingCart
class.description: ShoppingCart - provides a global way to interface with the cart (current order).

class.name: EcommerceRestfulServer
class.description: extends the standard RestfulServer to provide better access to extended classes.

class.name: ProductGroupSearchPage
class.description: This page manages searching for products

class.name: SearchReplacement
class.description: This dataobject saves search replacements as in Smoogle will be replaced by Google

class.name: OrderFilters_MemberAndAddress
class.description: Filter that searches the Two Addresses (billing + shipping) and the member. It searches all the relevant fields.

class.name: OrderFilters_MultiOptionsetStatusIDFilter
class.description: Allows you to filter orders for multiple statusIDs

class.name: OrderFilters_HasBeenCancelled
class.description: Allows you to filter for orders that have been cancelled.

class.name: OrderFilters_MustHaveAtLeastOnePayment
class.description: Allows you to filter for orders that have at leat one payment

class.name: ProductGroup
class.description: Product Group is a 'holder' for Products within the CMS It contains functions for versioning child products

class.name: CurrencyWidget
class.description: Allows the customer to select a currency

class.name: CartWidget
class.description: CartWidget displays the current contents of the user's cart.

class.name: GridFieldConfigForOrderItems
class.description: ensures that order items can not be auto-linked or deleted but retains all the other features of the GridFieldConfig_RelationEditor settings.

class.name: GridFieldEditButtonOriginalPage
class.description: Provides the entry point to editing a single record presented by the {@link GridField}.

class.name: GridFieldAddNewButtonOriginalPage
class.description: Provides the entry point to editing a single record presented by the {@link GridField}.

class.name: OrderFormAddress
class.description: This class is the form for editing the Order Addresses.

class.name: EcommerceClassNameOrTypeDropdownField
class.description: this is a dropdown field just for selecting the right classname

class.name: EcommerceCreditCardField
class.description: Allows input of credit card numbers via four separate form fields, including generic validation of its numeric values.

class.name: OrderStepField
class.description: This field shows the admin (and maybe the customer) where the Order is at (which orderstep)

class.name: Product_ProductImageUploadField
class.description: This is a preset upload field for product images.

class.name: OptionalTreeDropdownField
class.description: TreeDropdown-like field that gives you a tree of items including an empty field, using ajax.

class.name: SelectOrderAddressField
class.description: A field that allows the user to select an old address for the current order.

class.name: BuyableSelectField
class.description: Text input field that allows the user to select a Buyable.

class.name: Product
class.description: This is a standard Product page-type with fields like Price, Weight, Model and basic management of groups.

class.name: CheckoutPage
class.description: CheckoutPage is a CMS page-type that shows the order details to the customer for their current shopping cart on the site. It also lets the customer review the items in their cart, and manipulate them (add more, deduct or remove items completely). The most important thing is that the {@link CheckoutPage_Controller} handles the {@link OrderForm} form instance, allowing the customer to fill out their shipping details, confirming their order and making a payment.
